column2: create table Session (--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/H a row for each request sequence (page view or sql events within # minutes) from an IP ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --/T sessions tell is a lot about the context of a web request or sql request. --/T We ignore anything but pageviews and ignore VO-registry and BigBrother admin traffic --/T ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- sessionID int identity not # primary key , FirstEventID int not #, --/D first request in the session id /R SessionLog IpID int not #, --/D ipAddress of client id /R ipMap startTime datetime not #, --/D when session started limitTime datetime not #, --/D when session ended seconds int not #, --/D duration events int not #, --/D number of web or sql requests in session HTTP int not #, --/D number of web requests in session SQL int not #, --/D number of sql requests in session spiderCount int not # default (#) , --/D Spider hits to session (google or robots.txt) progCount int not # default (#) , --/D programs: java, python, perl, .. browserCount int not # default (#) , --/D browser client. sqlStems int default (#) , --/D distinct sql templates webStems int default (#) --/D distinct web urls) go
